thread.title: Gifford Pinchot National Forest closes Mount Adams Wilderness to public entry
thread.title_full: Gifford Pinchot National Forest closes Mount Adams Wilderness to public entry

author: senh
title: Gifford Pinchot National Forest closes Mount Adams Wilderness to public entry
text: BING NEWS: Gifford Pinchot National Forest closes Mount Adams Wilderness to public entry Entry to the entire Mount Adams Wilderness Area, including significant adjacent lands, was closed Tuesday, Aug. 26, by the supervisor of the Gifford Pinchot National Forest. The order was issued in the aftermath of the Cougar Creek fire, which has been ... 08/26/2015 - 4:55 am | View Link Horseshoe Fire in Gifford Pinchot grows larger ... 250 acres over the weekend on the west side of Mount Adams in the Mount Adams Wilderness of the Gifford Pinchot National Forest. The fire, which has been named the Horseshoe Fire, was reported about 4 p.m. Friday. By 11 a.m. Saturday, it had burned ... 08/26/2015 - 1:56 am | View Website InciWeb the Incident Information System: Mt Adams Complex The Horseshoe, Riley, 7 Lakes and Canyon Fires are located in the Mt Adams Wilderness on the Gifford Pinchot National Forest. As of 0600 on July 18, 2015, they are ... 08/26/2015 - 1:06 am | View Website Mount Adams (Washington) 1 Geography. 1.1 Summit area; 1.2 Glaciers; 1.3 Surrounding area; 2 Recreation. 2.1 Climbing; 2.2 Hiking. 2.2.1 Hiking in the Mount Adams Wilderness; 2.2.2 Hiking in ... 08/25/2015 - 7:05 am | View Website Gifford Pinchot National Forest, a Washington natlforest The Gifford Pinchot National Forest is one of the oldest National Forests in the United States.
